title: List of all Android qr generator  libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android qr generator  libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: android-qrcode-generator
repoList.description: Demo Android QR Code Generator using  ZXing library.

repoList.name: android_qrcode_scanner_generator
repoList.description: Android app which can scan, generate and save QR codes for you. Uses ZXing library.

repoList.name: QRGeneratorReader
repoList.description: QR generator and reader android application which uses Zxing library

repoList.name: QR-Code-Generator-using-ZXing-Library-Kotlin-Android-
repoList.description: QR Code integration using Google ZXing Library in Android Kotlin

repoList.name: QRCodeGenerator-Demo
repoList.description: A simple android application to show how to generate QR codes using the zxing library

repoList.name: QR_code_generator_and_reader_android
repoList.description: QR code generator and reader android, using Zxing java library

repoList.name: QR-Generator-and-Scanner
repoList.description: A QR coding and decoding android app built using  ZXing library to scan and Androidmads library to generate.

repoList.name: Simples-Android-QR-Code-Reader-Generator
repoList.description: A simple sample app to create and read QRCodes using ZXING library

repoList.name: GenerateQRCode
repoList.description: Demo Android QR Code Generator using ZXing library. https://github.com/zxing/zxing

repoList.name: QR-App
repoList.description: This is an android application which is used to Generate & Scan QR Code.This application include 2 libraries i.e QR Scanner & QR Generator.From this application user can easily generate its QR code by just typing any text in text field & by Clicking on Generate Button i.e in Main Activity & User can also Scan any QR Code through Scan button i.e in Main Activity. By Scanning any QR code User can know this what actually the Scanned QR code contains & it will show below the Scan View in the given Text Field.
